request_pathways.name: Authorization for Release of Medical Information from Ascension Sacred Heart

access_pathway.primary_pathway_description: Patients are directed to a Swellbox/Datavant online records request wizard as the primary pathway; a generic PDF authorization form and patient portal are also available.

red_flags: SSN collection for records access — unnecessary and creates identity theft risk
Purpose of request marked REQUIRED — HIPAA does not require patients to state a reason for self-access
Default to discharge summary only if patient does not specify record types — may result in incomplete disclosure
bright_spots: Swellbox online portal offered as primary patient pathway for record requests
Multi-facility coverage — single form covers four Ascension Sacred Heart locations
Electronic format delivery option offered alongside paper

findability.rationale: Level 4: Form found on first web search with standard ROI keywords; direct-download PDF at a stable URL. Not prominently linked from website navigation (patients directed to Swellbox instead), preventing a 5.

technical_accessibility.rationale: Level 4: The primary pathway (Swellbox portal) provides a fully digital workflow, but the PDF form has zero fillable fields and requires print-and-handwrite completion — a gap in the alternative pathway that prevents a 5.

content_design.rationale: Level 3: Adequate single-page layout with logical flow and useful checkboxes, but dense legal text in the lower third, no submission instructions, all-or-nothing sensitive information bundling, and a default-to-minimal-records warning create notable clarity problems.

patient_centeredness.rationale: Level 3: The PDF form is a generic third-party authorization — patients must identify themselves as both patient and recipient and navigate fields designed for broader use. The Swellbox portal partially compensates, but the downloadable form itself was not designed for patient self-access.

compliance.rationale: Level 3: SSN collection and mandatory purpose-of-request field go beyond what HIPAA requires for patient access; no fee disclosure; sensitive information authorization is all-or-nothing. Revocation rights and authorization expiration are properly stated.

overall.summary: Ascension Sacred Heart Pensacola offers a functional Swellbox online portal as its primary pathway, but its PDF form is a generic, non-fillable authorization with SSN collection and compliance concerns — resulting in an adequate but not patient-centered experience.
